channel.title: I Want To Be As Good As You, But Better - Must See
channel.description:
Thank you for viewing! I've found one on the forums which will help me get started on making a server.
Your sincerely [b]-|-[/b] A K A Girl [b]-|-[/b]
[b]First Of All[/b] Hi, I'm knew to moparscape and I just wanted to say hi to everyone and ask a few questions. If you feel that I am not welcomed to this forum being mean like others please leave now.
[b]My Goals[/b]
[ul][li]To learn java To become the best coder there is Meet new people Have fun while doing this Create my own game which will be called "A K A Girl" [/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]My Questions[/b] [b]Q[/b]1. How do I learn java in order to make a server? [b]A[/b]1.N/A [b]Q[/b]2. What source should I start on first? as in which source should I use? Test, Cheeze or P16? [b]A[/b]2.N/A

item.title: I Want To Be As Good As You, But Better - Must See
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Erm…

“How can I learn Java.”

The way you said that, it sounds like you expect it to happen with the snap of your fingers. Java does not equal 7 + 6, if that’s what you’re hoping.

Now, you can understand Java better by either looking at a source, looking at codes, or going to help websites. Just search with google.

Read full topic

Itachi Uchiha:

lol i think theres a thousand page book on learning java just search on google >.<

I got the compiled HTML Or’Reilly guide on Java. It is not quite a thousand pages but it would take a few months to read it (a lot with my schedule =/).

item.title: I Want To Be As Good As You, But Better - Must See
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

DaRtHeR:

Lol, My Testscape, Lol better that Project16 by far.

Answer for me the following questions and then you can say Testscape is better:

-Can your source last more then 3 hours without crashing?

-Does your useWith work?

-Can you make mods, admins, and staff members just by typeing there name and saving (no compiling and no extra code)?

-CastleWars?

-Project 16 has everything Testscape does + more.

-Project 16 is slowly, but surely, turning to the same types of coding Cheezscape and Testscape use.

-Testscape is the most bugged source in existance.

-People very rarely complain about bugs that are in P16 but no Testscape, or any bugs at all for that matter.

-People can pk extremely laggy and bad on Testscape but P16 runs smoothly.

I can just keep going on, but then I would get more technical and all people want is fun. So, really, answer my questions and comment against my comments. XD

Read full topic
item.source: I Want To Be As Good As You, But Better - Must See

item.title: I Want To Be As Good As You, But Better - Must See
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

ownt(PkerScape owner):

always use p 16. best out there

Yes, go to my post in the downloads section with the list if server source downloads. Download Project 16 version 6/ edit 7/ edit 8.

Then if you want to learn Java and have fun, you must NOT listen to the noobs and you MUST have a lot of experience in RuneScape if you want to code private servers (personal but helpful suggestion.) You also 100% MUST have the will to learn. You will want to know and get a long like a sibling the “Trial and error” method. Finally, to learn the Java you want for these sources, go to the tutorials section and study and edit inside your own source what it does. Eventually you can move up to fooling around with new ideas and making your own tutorials. Then you can learn about clients, caches, deobs, and how they all connect. Then you can come to my Project 4 thread and join my team because I will finally have another person who knows what they are doing on the team. XD

Read full topic
item.source: I Want To Be As Good As You, But Better - Must See

@A_K_A_Girl wrote:

Thank you for viewing!
I’ve found one on the forums which will help me get started on making a server.

Your sincerely
-|- A K A Girl -|-

First Of All
Hi, I’m knew to moparscape and I just wanted to say hi to everyone and ask a few questions. If you feel that I am not welcomed to this forum being mean like others please leave now.

My Goals

[ul][li]To learn java
To become the best coder there is
Meet new people
Have fun while doing this
Create my own game which will be called “A K A Girl” [/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

My Questions
Q1. How do I learn java in order to make a server?
A1.N/A
Q2. What source should I start on first? as in which source should I use? Test, Cheeze or P16?
A2.N/A
